name: Pureit Wave Prime Mineral RO+MF | 6 stage Purification | 7 Litres Capacity | Up to 45% Water Saving | Suitable for Borewell, Tanker & Muncipal Water | Wall Mountable | Black
description:
Presenting the new Wave Prime that is WQA tested for family safety.
The mineral enhancer cartridge enriches your water with essential minerals like calcium & magnesium, providing you with 100% RO water without bypass.
iSF (Internal Sediment Filter) that lasts 2x longer.
SmartSense indicators alert you 15 days before filter expiry and suspend water dispensing if the filter is not changed, ensuring you receive mineral-enriched, safe RO water.
Highest storage capacity of 7 liters, so that you & your family never run out of fresh & safe RO water.
Longer filter life of 6000 liters, which is double compared to ordinary ROs.
Purifies all types of drinking water: borewell, tanker & tap water.
Other features: High-speed purification up to 20 LPH, 6-stage purification, 100% food-grade plastic, premium design and aesthetics, and 24x7 WhatsApp assistance.
Color: Black, Capacity: Up to 7 liters, Power: 36 watts, Input Water Temperature: 10 degrees Celsius to 40 degrees Celsius, Operative Input Voltage: 100-240 V a.c. 50/60 Hz (Device can withstand voltage fluctuation from 100 to 300 V a.c.).
Product Dimensions: Length 27.4 cm X Width 32.5 cm X Height 38 cm; Pack inclusions: Water purifier, installation kit, warranty card & handheld TDS meter. Excluded in the box: Booster pump, pressure reducing valve, and an iron cartridge (these are based on pressure conditions and to be purchased at the time of installation). Please refer to the device manual for detailed disclaimers/terms & conditions.
